resources.string: This is the main Activity(fragment),Is where you can find all the songs retrieved from the device and I used listview combined with arrayAdapter to display all the songs .
This activity(fragment) display the recently played songs.
This is the SearchActivity(Fragment),here you can look for all the available songs in your device.
This Activity Show the current playing songs.The APIs used are MediaPlayer and AudioManager
This Activity will use Paypal API to do a payment
